actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 with respect to the treatment of interest paid in connection with certain life insurance contracts.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to disallow a deduction for excess interest paid in connection with certain life insurance contracts. Modifies provisions with respect to indebtedness under such contracts. Requires the filing of information returns relating to changes in the insured under such contracts.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 with respect to the treatment of interest paid in connection with certain life insurance contracts.
